description:
Run like the wind, without the cold that goes with it. These winter wool tights give you warmth and mobility on your cold temperature runs. Add in the rain shedding coating and reflective details to make these tights ready for your next adventure.

  • A technical wool blend provides full stretch and warmth so you can run and jump how you want
  • BIONIC-FINISH® ECO fluorocarbon-free water and dirt repellent finish helps keep you clean and dry, while still letting your legs breathe
  • Strategically placed mesh panels in the side and knee improve breathability and mobility
  • Flat lock seams reduce rubbing so you’re comfortable on longer runs
  • Reflective logo and details are there to keep you seen while out on those night runs
name: B Daehlie Winter Wool Tights  2.0 - Women's
